findings.title: Token supply is unlimited
findings.description: There is no restrictions on the number of tokens that can be minted or sold. The owner can mint as many tokens as he wants at no cost.

findings.title: Consider using withdrawal pattern
findings.description: While rejecting a request for buying tokens, it won’t always work since ether transfer can be rejected by the target address.

findings.title: Several critical, major and minor issues were found during the audit which could break the intended behaviour
findings.description: The audit revealed multiple critical, major, and minor vulnerabilities that can compromise the intended functionality of the smart contracts.

findings.title: Consider using NPM to manage OpenZeppelin
findings.description: OpenZeppelin contracts were copied from the repository and can be managed using NPM which helps in maintaining and updating the library more easily.
